Class Registry

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractModel
      • model.Registry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel

    public class Registry
extends AbstractModel
    Author:
    chusk3 This class is used by the Simulation, WriteBack, and Issue units to provide a common access into the registers.
